column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Crysta - Thank you very much for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it! And thank you for your numerous visits. The very lifeblood of any restaurant are its regular customers
column2: so I'm proud to consider you among these special ranks. I'm glad you received good service; our entire staff works very hard to perform as a cohesive team and provide the best
column3: consistent service possible to our customers.
